about_the_game:
Game development started 02.01.2023 and is still in development by a starting Ukrainian solo game developer.

WARNING: This game may contain scenes of violence, cannibalism and other poorly drawn events that some players may find disturbing! Even though it is all just drawn, such scenes may seem unacceptable for someone. If you are a sensitive person, then be ready to get strenghten up by this product while playing it(or do not play it at all).

This is just a first build of the game, a lot of things are most likely to change. A lot of things will be added.

This game has intense gameplay.
The game wasn't planned to be done so, but community decided that this game is Doom-like, so further development will be going the way community sees this product.

In the release state you will be able to see:
- glory kills and violent finishers;
- loads of guns: mere weaponary and ranged firearms;
- fast based gameplay with different mechanics to spice things up;
- epic music that will increase your thirst for blood;
- different gamemodes.

Again: the game is still in development, so all of the following feachures are in the development state.

If you have any suggestions or whatever: feel free to contact me!
